outputs.output_descr: The Arms for Development seeks to enhance a national strategy for sustainable small arms control in Sierra Leone. Key areas of intervention include: 1) institutional capacity building , (2)   policy and legislative reforms, (2) border control (3) stockpile management (4) small arms survey and (5) implementation of  community development projects.

The Arms for Development seeks to enhance a national strategy for sustainable small arms control in Sierra Leone. Key areas of intervention include: 1) implementation of community development projects as incentive for voluntary surrender of weapons  (2) stockpile management (3) institutional capacity building and (4) border control

The Arms for Development seeks to enhance a national strategy for sustainable small arms control in Sierra Leone. Key areas of intervention include: 1) institutional capacity building , (2)   policy and legislative reforms, (2) border control (3) stockpile management (4) small arms survey and (5) implementation of  community development projects.

The Arms for Development seeks to enhance a national strategy for sustainable small arms control in Sierra Leone. Key areas of intervention include: 1) institutional capacity building , (2)   policy and legislative reforms, (2) border control (3) stockpile management (4) small arms survey and (5) implementation of  community development projects.
